data.name: Additional Bertholdt Costume: Pajama Outfit
data.detailed_description:
A new costume for Bertholdt is added.
Pajamas for Bertholdt. Enjoy battles and daily life sections in new fashion.

▼How to use
You can access the new costume by performing either of the following:
1. Select "Another Mode" on the main menu, and then select Bertholdt.
Change into the costume "Pajama Outfit" by selecting "Character Editor" when you are near the tent on the field.
2. Select "Story Mode" on the main menu, and then approach Bertholdt in the Daily Life section.
Change into the costume "Pajama Outfit" by selecting "Change outfit" when you are near Bertholdt.
